mdRecord.dcterms:title: Rand McNally Official 1922 auto trails map, District no. 20
Official 1922 auto trails map, District 20
Rand McNally Official auto trails map, District no. 20
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Rand McNally and Company. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: Chicago : Rand McNally and Company, [1922], c1921.
1 map ; 62 x 79 cm. folded into cover 18 x 10 cm.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Covers: Southern Ohio, West Virginia, Virginia, Southern Maryland, Southern Delaware, North Carolina, Northern South Carolina, Northern Georga, E. Tennessee, E. Kentucky. [original]
Information on trail markings and individual state highway markers at bottom of sheet. [original]
Folded into original printed covers that feature an advertisement for Bedford Motor Company on front. [original]
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Gift of Howard E. Johnston. [original]
